scenes.background: [Bob] nods thoughtfully, then glances at [Monica] and you.
scenes.description: 'Still, it's tough when people feel left out.'

options.text: We could rotate celebration ideas so everyone gets a turn.
options.analysis: You proposed a rotating system to include everyone's preferences, showing good perception and empathy but moderate social skills and self-regulation.

options.text: True, but it's hard to find a solution that pleases everyone.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the difficulty of pleasing everyone, showing good self-regulation and motivation but moderate perception and empathy.

options.text: Maybe we should set a rule that everyone must compromise sometimes.
options.analysis: You suggested a rule for compromise, showing good social skills and motivation but lower empathy.
